comment: барк бомжа около цепи, после катсцены убийства

languages.text: "Тут надо сторонкой, по теням, в обход... В Прорве везде просочиться можно".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Тут надо или прокрасться или найти обходной путь

languages.text: "You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."
languages.original_text: "Тут надо сторонкой, по теням, в обход... В Прорве везде просочиться можно".

traits.locale_text: "You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."
"You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."
"You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."
"You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."

languages.text: “你得蹑手蹑脚地走，躲在阴影里，绕过去……在裂隙这个地方，能钻的地方要尽量钻。”
languages.original_text: "You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."

traits.locale_text: “你得蹑手蹑脚地走，躲在阴影里，绕过去……在裂隙这个地方，能钻的地方要尽量钻。”

languages.text: «Tienes que pasar a hurtadillas, por las sombras, dando un rodeo... En el Abismo, puedes llegar a cualquier parte».
languages.original_text: "You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."

traits.locale_text: «Tienes que pasar a hurtadillas, por las sombras, dando un rodeo... En el Abismo, puedes llegar a cualquier parte».

languages.text: 「忍び寄り、影に潜み、回り込む…裂け目では、どこにでも入り込めるんだ」
languages.original_text: "You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."

traits.locale_text: 「忍び寄り、影に潜み、回り込む…裂け目では、どこにでも入り込めるんだ」

languages.text: « Il faut raser les murs, se faufiler dans les ombres et contourner tout ce qui peut l'être... Dans l'Abîme, on peut aller partout. »
languages.original_text: "You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut raser les murs, se faufiler dans les ombres et contourner tout ce qui peut l'être... Dans l'Abîme, on peut aller partout. »

languages.text: "Ihr müsst herumschleichen, in den Schatten bleiben, außen herumgehen ... In die Kluft kommt man überall."
languages.original_text: "You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst herumschleichen, in den Schatten bleiben, außen herumgehen ... In die Kluft kommt man überall."

languages.text: "Yavaşça hareket et, gölgelerden çıkma, etraflarından dolaş... Bu şekilde Yarık'taki her yere ulaşabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "You've got to creep along, stick to the shadows, go around... In the Chasm, you can get in anywhere."

traits.locale_text: "Yavaşça hareket etmelisin, gölgelerden ayrılmamalısın, etraflarından dolaşmalısın... Yarık'ta her yere ulaşabilirsin."
